body.name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Face Moisturizer with SPF 25, Hydrating Facial Sunscreen, Oil-Free and Non-Comedogenic Water Gel Face Lotion 1.7 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 hrs 43 mins
features: 1.7-ounces of Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Hydrating Water Gel Face Moisturizer with SPF 25 Sunscreen & hyaluronic acid protects pollution-exposed skin against sun damage & replenishes for soft, supple skin

A lightweight water gel formula with broad spectrum SPF 25 UVA/UVB sunscreen boosted with a complex of purified hyaluronic acid. Naturally found in skin, hyaluronic acid is a hydrator that binds to water and holds it in

Also contains antioxidants, which are known to help fight daily aggressors. This hydrating SPF 25 sunscreen gel helps fight the signs of tired, dull-looking skin and features an oil-free, alcohol-free, and non-comedogenic formula

Hydrating water gel is suitable for all skin types & can be worn alone or under makeup, making it the perfect addition to your daily skincare routine. Apply SPF 25 water gel daily to replenish skin & protect pollution-exposed skin against the sun

Apply this SPF 25 water gel every day to instantly quench skin while protecting pollution-exposed skin against the sun. Hydro Boost collection includes hydrating Hand Cream, Body Gel Cream, Facial Moisturizers and Cleansers
body.description: Help protect skin from sun damage and fight pollution and dryness with Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Hydrating Water Gel Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 25 Sunscreen and hyaluronic acid. Suitable for all skin types, this water gel daily face moisturizer helps fight the signs of tired, dull-looking skin. It contains broad spectrum SPF 25 UVA/UVB sunscreen boosted with a complex of purified hyaluronic acid, a hydrator found naturally in the skin that binds to water and holds it in. The hydrating water gel sunscreen also contains antioxidants, known to help fight daily aggressors like pollution. The lightweight, non-comedogenic, alcohol-, and oil-free formula can be applied alone or under makeup, making Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Water Gel SPF 25 the perfect addition to your daily skincare routine. Designed with the Earth in mind. We've removed the window and plastic tray from this carton for easier recycling.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: To Use: Apply daily on your face and neck as the last step in your skincare routine. Wears beautifully under makeup Lightweight: The unique gel-cream formula absorbs into skin quickly like a gel but has the lasting moisturizing power of a cream Results: This SPF water gel protects & moisturizes for hydrated skin. Fights the signs of tired skin while protecting pollution-exposed skin against sun damage Enhance Your Hydration: Pair with City Shield SPF 25 Water Gel with Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid for lasting hydration

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hydrates the face
reviews.reviewText: This is a good product to hydrate the face. I use it after washing my face and my skin feels soft and supple. It's light and not oily. Good for dry skin. Drys fast and doesn't smudge makeup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels and smells so nice!
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite face moisturizer I’ve ever used. It smells and feels so lovely. It is not oily or sticky at all. It absorbs instantly and blends with makeup just fine, no problems at all. It would be my first choice even without sunscreen … but it DOES have sunscreen, so even better! (Until this, I’ve never before found a face moisturizer with spf that I’ve been able to tolerate, due to sensitive skin.) This is my second jar. I didn’t track how long the first lasted. It is pricey, but worth it, and using Amazon subscribe and save is the way to go, a far better price than at any store I’ve seen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not greasy but moisturizing
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Not greasy but moisturizing. Lightweight sunscreen. Great base under makeup and does not clog pores. I buy this over and over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft suppke skin with a nice glow
reviews.reviewText: I use this product daily after showers and before bed. I am a male who has eczema and dry skin. I get very very flaky. This is my second favorite product. It keeps my skin soft but more importantly moisturized. I have seen a visible change in my skin. I will always suffer flaky dry skin but the effected areas has reduce. On my rebuy list. Oh and apparently it's good for ladies too. Whaddya know

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My dermatologist suggested this and I am very pleased! Its the only sunscreen that works for me. The others make my face break out even though the labels say they won’t. This feels AMAZING on my face! Its lightweight and even though the SPF could be higher (I believe they suggest 30 and this is 25), my face is still being protected. The jar is little but it lasts very long because a little goes a long way. Try it! You won’t regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: Was recommended by my dermatologist and my sister. I finally tried it for myself and I have to say I love it! Does not leave my already oily skin feeling oily at all. Goes on great and soaks into skin. Also love that it includes spf 25, I switched from Clinique moisturizer surge that didn’t have spf

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Moisturizes well without a heavy or greasy feel. Love that it has sunscreen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great hydrating face gel with SPF protection
reviews.reviewText: Keeps your face smooth and moisturized without feeling greasy.Best that I have found.

Me gusta el aroma y la textura. Yo vivo en un lugar muy caliente así que prefiero almacenar mis productos en el refri. Y bueno esta padre que tiene protección solar pero me gustaría que por lo menos fuera de 30. Lo que sí definitivamente noto es la hidratación eh. Cuando termine esta probaré la de eucerin que básicamente lo mismo pero FPS de 30...Si tienes la piel oleosa (yo no) te va gustar o cómo si la quieres para que usar antes de aplicar la base está bien!
Huele horrible y no cumple lo que promete. Me dejé llevar por las reseñas que dicen que es buena para pieles grasas y es falso.
